attributes.review:
Ya I know I’m gonna the night wowi I ui iwowow 
It ruined my phone I can’t type without speaking to type this whole app connected to my phone and they took all my info and made it so I’m unable to type I highly do not recommend!! It’s only to get your information!! Oh and a plus to this is they will literally show up to your house for trying to delete this app 🤗🤗
attributes.title: I saw the reviews and they were true 😱

attributes.review: Not only did this app take FOREVER to download, but as soon as it finally did, my phone began messing up and overheating constantly. I tried to delete and IT WOULDNT DELETE. It also tried to erase all o my contacts and clear my exit conversations. It even deleted some of my voicemails!!!!! This is a warning to everyone to NOT get this app or else it might happen to you as well! Everyone be careful out there!!!
attributes.title: HATE this app.

attributes.review: I downloaded this wonderful app so I could support my favorite president 🥴🥰🧚🏻‍♀️. The app didn’t work AT ALL. The quality is terrible and so is the marketing. LETS NOT FORGET that our wonderful president supports women, minority’s and poc so much, yet I saw nothing about his plan to better society for any of these people?? Where’s the important part of the campaign.😔 Anyways I was really expecting better from daddy trump but maybe it’ll be better next time. 😌
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: this app was HORRIBLE!! i opened it and it took over 5 minutes to load.🙄 after that when i tried to use the actual app some buttons wernt working and it started to glitch. i then closed the app and all the app buttons worked again😠❌ like huh?! so it’s a crappy app about a crappy man definitely not worth using your time and effort to download and use. 👿🤜🏼🤬
attributes.title: PLEASE save yourself and don’t download

attributes.review: this app took so long to download and during that three monthperiod, i lost my job, lost my wife and my 18 children 😔😔. i was forced to become a male stripper even though i am a virgin. this app blares jake pauls music everytime i open it and crashes my entire phone when i use it to? i just wanna support my president as i am constantly attacked in this country as a white cishet straight man.😔😔 women hate me bc im "racist" or "ugly" or "idolizes mike pence to a concerning degree to the point where i have an mike pence shrine in my bathroom next to my toilet" this app makes things very difficult bc as soon as i downloaded it i started wearing mom jeans and hawaiian shirts and people started asking if i listened to girl in red???
attributes.title: do not recommend

attributes.review: I would give this app 0 stars if I could. I downloaded this app out of respect for our President however shortly after my phone began GLITCHING. I wanted to trust our president but the makers of the app CLEARLY FAILED. There were all kinds of security issues and all kinds of negative energy. The app and its contents did not feel like a safe space for our democracy. DISGUSTING. My phone storage is completely full because of it. I REGRET DOWNLOADING THIS APP DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE AS ME
attributes.title: BAD HORRIBLE DO NOT RISK IT

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about Donald Jenius (Jewish?) Trump. But it took so long to download. After I downloaded it my phone kept glitching and I started to feel the need to give up my rights as a women!! I even starting to get propaganda letters in the mail teaching me how to work in the home and telling me that the workforce is no place for a woman!! Worst app ever. It really messes with your mind. I finally deleted it. Best decision of my life ✨🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!

attributes.review: I’m a fellow trump and MAGA supporter but this app the moment I opened it it would continuously log me out and make my phone glitch horribly,  and I knew it was the app Bc my phone was fine after I deleted it and took my phone to apple and even apple says a lot of people have come in with the same problem do to the trump app, they highly recommend you do no get this APP!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE, it will crash your phone 🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️

attributes.review: i can't believe i'm actually admitting to this but i downloaded this app to help be caught up on daily news when a picture of a burnt orange man popped up. he made a homophobic remark then proceeded to PUNCH ME IN THE FACE. now anytime anyone gets on the app he has his fist displayed with a smile because of how proud he was of his actions he made against me. this app put me into a seven year acoma and i believe it should be removed from the app store.
attributes.title: this app put me into a 7 year acoma

attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted a trusty news source. But when I got it, all I saw was a Cheeto staring at me, it was haunting. I tried to get off the app, but instead the head of our dear president popped up in my phone and started multiple speeches that sounded like a kindergartner wrote them. I finally managed to escape the curse by resting my phone, but I still feel his presence lurking around, like he’s somewhere in the shadows.
attributes.title: Congrats on #1! 🧚💕✨As in, 1 Star🙈💕🧚✨
